recipes.title: Vegan Tofu Wrap
recipes.summary: Indulge in the deliciousness of this Vegan Tofu Wrap. Packed with extra-firm tofu, creamy avocado, fresh lettuce, and flavorful hummus, it's a delight for vegan enthusiasts. This recipe serves 4 and costs $7.99 per serving. Each serving has 320 calories, 18g of protein, and 15g of healthy fats. Enjoy the plant-based goodness in every bite!

winePairing.pairingText: For a perfect pairing, enjoy this tofu wrap with a glass of sauvignon blanc, chardonnay, or sparkling water.

productMatches.title: Organic Sauvignon Blanc
productMatches.description: A crisp and refreshing organic sauvignon blanc.

productMatches.title: Chardonnay Reserve
productMatches.description: A rich and well-balanced chardonnay reserve.

productMatches.title: Sparkling Water Elegance
productMatches.description: A premium sparkling water for a refreshing experience.

recipes.instructions:
1. Sauté sliced extra-firm tofu until golden brown.
2. Spread hummus on each whole wheat wrap.
3. Layer sautéed tofu, sliced avocado, shredded lettuce, and tomato on the wraps.
4. Roll the wraps tightly, securing the filling.
5. Slice each wrap in half and serve.
6. Enjoy your delicious Vegan Tofu Wrap!

steps.step: Sauté sliced extra-firm tofu until golden brown.
Spread hummus on each whole wheat wrap.
Layer sautéed tofu, sliced avocado, shredded lettuce, and tomato on the wraps.
Roll the wraps tightly, securing the filling.
Slice each wrap in half and serve.
Enjoy your delicious Vegan Tofu Wrap!

recipes.title: Peanut Delight Noodles
recipes.summary: Indulge in the savory goodness of Rice Noodles in Peanut Sauce. This vegan and gluten-free dish is a delight for noodle lovers. Each serving is priced at $6.99 and provides 300 calories, 8g of protein, and 12g of healthy fats. The combination of rice noodles, peanut butter, soy sauce, and fresh vegetables creates a flavorful and satisfying meal. Visit our website for the full recipe and enjoy the taste of these Peanut Delight Noodles!
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook the rice noodles according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
2. In a saucepan, combine the following ingredients for the peanut sauce: peanut butter, soy sauce, maple syrup, rice vinegar, sesame oil, and garlic. Heat over medium heat, stirring until well combined and heated through.
3. In a large bowl, toss the cooked rice noodles with the prepared peanut sauce until evenly coated.
4. Add the shredded carrots, sliced bell peppers, and chopped green onions to the noodles. Mix well to incorporate the vegetables.
5. Garnish with chopped peanuts and cilantro before serving.
6. Serve the rice noodles in peanut sauce warm or cold, according to your preference. Enjoy!

steps.step: Cook the rice noodles according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.

In a saucepan, combine the following ingredients for the peanut sauce: peanut butter, soy sauce, maple syrup, rice vinegar, sesame oil, and garlic. Heat over medium heat, stirring until well combined and heated through.
In a large bowl, toss the cooked rice noodles with the prepared peanut sauce until evenly coated.
Add the shredded carrots, sliced bell peppers, and chopped green onions to the noodles. Mix well to incorporate the vegetables.
Garnish with chopped peanuts and cilantro before serving.
Serve the rice noodles in peanut sauce warm or cold, according to your preference. Enjoy!

recipes.title: Sushi Delight
recipes.summary: Indulge in the deliciousness of homemade sushi with this Sushi Delight recipe. Packed with fresh sushi-grade salmon, creamy avocado, and crisp cucumber, it's a delight for sushi lovers. This recipe serves 4 and costs $5.99 per serving. Each serving has 250 calories, 15g of protein, and 10g of healthy fats. For the perfect finish, drizzle with soy sauce and add a kick of wasabi. Enjoy the flavors of Japan in the comfort of your home!

winePairing.pairingText: For a perfect pairing, enjoy this sushi with a glass of sake, pinot noir, or riesling.

productMatches.title: Premium Sake
productMatches.description: A high-quality sake to complement the flavors of sushi.

productMatches.title: Pinot Noir Reserve
productMatches.description: An exquisite pinot noir with notes that enhance sushi enjoyment.

productMatches.title: Riesling Elegance
productMatches.description: A crisp riesling that elevates the sushi experience.

recipes.instructions:
1. Lay a sheet of seaweed on a bamboo sushi mat.
2. Place a thin layer of sushi rice on the seaweed.
3. Arrange slices of sushi-grade salmon, avocado, and julienned cucumber on the rice.
4. Drizzle with soy sauce and add wasabi for a kick.
5. Roll the sushi tightly using the bamboo mat.
6. Slice the roll into bite-sized pieces.
7. Serve with additional soy sauce and enjoy!

steps.step: Lay a sheet of seaweed on a bamboo sushi mat.
Place a thin layer of sushi rice on the seaweed.
Arrange slices of sushi-grade salmon, avocado, and julienned cucumber on the rice.
Drizzle with soy sauce and add wasabi for a kick.
Roll the sushi tightly using the bamboo mat.
Slice the roll into bite-sized pieces.
Serve with additional soy sauce and enjoy!

recipes.title: Duck Delight
recipes.summary: Indulge in the savory goodness of Duck Delight with Dumplings. This recipe features a whole duck, cleaned and trimmed, paired with delicious dumplings. With a preparation time of 30 minutes and cooking time of 2 hours, it serves 4 and costs $9.99 per serving. Each serving has 450 calories, 30g of protein, and 20g of flavorful fats. For a delightful experience, pair it with your favorite sauce and enjoy the richness of duck and the comfort of dumplings!

winePairing.pairingText: For a perfect pairing, enjoy this Duck Delight with Dumplings with a glass of merlot, cabernet sauvignon, or chardonnay.

productMatches.title: Premium Merlot
productMatches.description: A high-quality merlot to complement the flavors of duck.

productMatches.title: Cabernet Sauvignon Reserve
productMatches.description: An exquisite cabernet sauvignon with notes that enhance the duck experience.

productMatches.title: Chardonnay Elegance
productMatches.description: A crisp chardonnay that elevates the dumpling experience.

recipes.instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Season the duck with salt and pepper, then place it in a roasting pan.
3. Roast the duck for 2 hours or until the skin is crispy and the meat is cooked through.
4. While the duck is roasting, prepare the dumplings. In a mixing bowl, combine flour and water to form a dough.
5. Roll out the dough on a floured surface and cut it into small dumpling shapes.
6. In a separate pot, sauté carrots, celery, onion, and garlic until softened.
7. Add chicken broth, soy sauce, and sesame oil to the pot and bring to a simmer.
8. Drop the dumplings into the simmering broth and cook until they float to the surface.
9. Once the duck is done, carve it into serving portions.
10. Serve the duck on a plate with dumplings and pour the broth over the top.
11. Garnish with chopped green onions and serve hot.

steps.step: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).

Roast the duck for 2 hours or until the skin is crispy and the meat is cooked through.

recipes.title: Potato chips Subzi
recipes.summary: If you want to add more American recipes to your recipe box, Potato chips Subzi might be a recipe you should try. This gluten free, dairy free, lacto ovo vegetarian, and vegan recipe serves 2 and costs 93 cents per serving. This side dish has 371 calories, 10g of protein, and 10g of fat per serving. If you have broken cashew nuts, potatoes, sugar, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. It is brought to you by Spice Up the Curry. 3 people were impressed by this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 10 minutes. Taking all factors into account, this recipe earns a spoonacular score of 37%, which is rather bad. Users who liked this recipe also liked Green Peas Subzi (Mutter Subzi), Potato Capsicum Curry – Aloo Capsicum Subzi, and Bacon Cheddar Potato Peel Chips (Don’t Throw Away Your Potato Peels!).
recipes.instructions: Heat the oil in a pan for deep frying on medium heat.Once oil is hot, deep fry the potato chips in two batches until they are light golden brown. It will take 6 minutes for each batch. Take them out on paper lined dish when done.Heat the 1 tablespoon of oil in a pan.Once hot add cashew nuts and sauté them for 1 minute or until they are light brown.Add sesame seeds, cumin seeds and turmeric powder, sauté for 30 seconds.Add fried chips, salt, chili powder, sugar and lemon juice. Mix well. Cook it for 1 minute. Turn of the heat. Serve hot.If not serving right away then do not cover it while it is hot otherwise the steam will make the potatoes soggy.

steps.step: Heat the oil in a pan for deep frying on medium heat.Once oil is hot, deep fry the potato chips in two batches until they are light golden brown. It will take 6 minutes for each batch. Take them out on paper lined dish when done.
Heat the 1 tablespoon of oil in a pan.Once hot add cashew nuts and sauté them for 1 minute or until they are light brown.
Add sesame seeds, cumin seeds and turmeric powder, sauté for 30 seconds.
Add fried chips, salt, chili powder, sugar and lemon juice.
Mix well. Cook it for 1 minute. Turn of the heat.
Serve hot.If not serving right away then do not cover it while it is hot otherwise the steam will make the potatoes soggy.

recipes.title: Creamy Chicken Pasta
recipes.summary: Enjoy a delicious and creamy chicken dish that's perfect for any occasion. This recipe is gluten-free and packed with flavor.

winePairing.pairingText: Pair this creamy chicken with a glass of Chardonnay or Sauvignon Blanc for a delightful dining experience.

recipes.instructions:
1. In a large skillet, cook the diced chicken breast until browned.
2. Pour in the heavy cream and let it simmer for 15 minutes.
3. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
 4. Cook the Pasta and add salt.
 5. Add Pasta to the chicken.
6. Serve hot and enjoy!

steps.step: In a large skillet, cook the diced chicken breast until browned.
Pour in the heavy cream and let it simmer for 15 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Cook the Pasta and add salt.
5.Add Pasta to the chicken.
Serve hot and enjoy!
